value.name: Two Men Charged In Fatal Shooting Of 28-Year-Old Eddie Barajas At A Garden Grove Hotel
value.description: Two men, both allegedly Los Angeles gang members, were behind bars Tuesday on charges related to the fatal shooting of 28-year-old Eddie Barajas on Jan. 17 at a Hyatt Regency Hotel.

value.name: Two Charged with Fatal Shooting in Garden Grove Hotel
value.description: Two alleged Los Angeles gang members were behind bars Tuesday on charges related to the fatal shooting of a man in a Garden Grove hotel in January. Enrique Torres, 19, of Los Angeles, is charged with murder with sentencing enhancements for gang activity,

value.name: Man Chases Estranged Wife With Knives Onto Field of Their Child's Sporting Event, Police Say
value.description: A GGPD spokesman, Lieutenant Mario Martinez, said that the incident took place at a flag football game and that multiple spectators and parents intervened to stop Husges before police arrived.

value.name: NYC shootings this year, topping 777, have surpassed 2019 numbers, police say
